content.question: As a glacier melts, the volume <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the ice, measured in cubic kilometers, decreases at a rate modeled by the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of V, with respect to t, equals, k V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>V</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is measured in years. The volume of the glacier is <math alttext="400 cubic kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>400</mn><mo>⁢</mo></mrow></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mrow><mo>⁢</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mspace></mspace><mtext>km</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> at time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. At the moment when the volume of the glacier is <math alttext="300 cubic kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mn>300</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>km</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>, the volume is decreasing at the rate of <math alttext="15 cubic kilometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>15</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><msup><mrow><mtext>km</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> per year. What is the volume <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> in terms of time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="V equals, 400 minus, 0.025 times t squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>0.025</mn><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V equals, 400 times e raised to the negative 0.05 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="V equals, e raised to the negative 0.05 t power, plus 399" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>399</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="V equals, 400 times e raised to the negative 0.05 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>V</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 3.G: Confirm that solutions are accurate and appropriate.
